title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton; polychrome
Technique: painted and dyed
description: Panel with pointed top. Natural colored ground. Lower half has two broad bands, each band having two cows with all-over design of red hand prints, on each side of central lunette enclosing figure of a man. These bands are separated by a band of lotus blossoms on water and a floral ornamental band, both of which are repeated for border at bottom. At top a pillow (?) with a peacock over it and flanked on each side by a woman carrying a bowl. Floral border repeated at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century. Medium: cotton; polychrome
Technique: painted and dyed. 1938-26-6.
